mapper.select: /* ReservationMapper.selectReservationByReservationId */ select a.reservation_name as reservationName , a.reservation_id as reservationId , b.farm_account_no as farmAccountNo , case when b.farm_kind = '01' THEN '농장' when b.farm_kind = '02' THEN '목장' else '체험' end as farmKindNm , b.farm_name as farmName , '0' as reviewStar , '0명' as reviewStarCnt , b.farm_owner_tel as farmOwnerTel , concat(b.farm_use_time, ' ', '체험시간 ', CASE WHEN MOD(b.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60) = 0 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(b.farm_use_time_detail), '시간') ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(b.farm_use_time_detail), '시간 ', LPAD(MOD(b.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60), 2, '0'), '분' ) END ) as farmUseTimeDetail , a.reservation_date as reservationDate , a.reservation_participants as reservationParticipants , concat(a.reservation_start_time, ' ~ ', a.reservation_end_time) as reservationTime , d.file_url as farmMainImageUrl , b.farm_use_day as farmUseDay from reservation a left join farm b on a.farm_id = b.farm_id left join file_group c on b.farm_main_image = c.file_group_id left join file d on c.file_group_id = d.file_group_id where a.reservation_id = #{reservationId}

/* ReservationMapper.selectReservationByUserId */ select a.reservation_id as reservationId , a.reservation_status as reservationStatus , case when a.reservation_status = '00' THEN '예약대기' when a.reservation_status = '01' THEN '예약확정' else '예약취소' end as reservationStatusNm , b.farm_account_no as farmAccountNo , case when b.farm_kind = '01' THEN '농장' when b.farm_kind = '02' THEN '목장' else '체험' end as farmKindNm , b.farm_name as farmName , b.farm_zip as farmZip , b.farm_owner_tel as farmOwnerTel , concat(b.farm_use_time, ' ', '체험시간 ', CASE WHEN MOD(b.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60) = 0 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(b.farm_use_time_detail), '시간') ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(b.farm_use_time_detail), '시간 ', LPAD(MOD(b.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60), 2, '0'), '분' ) END ) as farmUseTimeDetail , a.reservation_date as reservationDate , a.reservation_participants as reservationParticipants , a.reservation_start_time as reservationStartTime , a.reservation_end_time as reservationEndTime , a.reservation_name as reservationName , a.reservation_tel as reservationTel , a.reservation_email as reservationEmail , concat(format(b.farm_use_amt, 0), '원') as farmUseAmt , d.file_url as farmMainImageUrl , b.farm_use_day as farmUseDay from reservation a left join farm b on a.farm_id = b.farm_id left join file_group c on b.farm_main_image = c.file_group_id left join file d on c.file_group_id = d.file_group_id where a.user_id = #{user_id}
